fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Deal 1 damage to the target. Then apply 3 rounds of Poison afterwards.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The initial attack, and the Poison attack, are independent. They must be blocked separately.
- Poison applies 1 damage to the target at the end of each round.
- If the target is already Poisoned, its duration will be increased by 3 instead.
